commands_command_data:
Available commands:

**::kill <optionally mention someone>**
**::changelog**
**::raid <optionally mention where>**
**::source**
**::prune <number of messages to remove>**
**::game <'string here'> | type=<1 for Twitch or 2 for Youtube (Soon:tm:)>**
**::debug (Bot owner only)**
**::color ::pink/::brown <role name here>**
**::meme <picture (required)> | <top text (required)> | <bottom text (required)>**
meme picture list can be found here. (BooBot's but it works for this too.) <http://pastebin.com/gCL2jMEL>

**::remgame (Removes any game from status)**
**::join <invite url or code>**
**::update**
**::say <whatever you want here>**
**::type**
**::uptime**
**::reload (Bot owner only)**
**::hlreload (Bot owner only)**
**::pyversion**
**::Libs**
**::userinfo <mention user (optional if you want to see your own info)>**
**::kick <mention person here>**
**::ban <mention person here>**
**::softban <mention person here>**
**::clear (Clears all messages from bot within a 100 message limit.)**
**::ignorechannel**
**::unignorechannel**
**::as (changes bot's avatar to Asura's image)**
**::rs (changes bot's avatar to Rune Slayer's image)**
**::ai (changes bot's avatar to Aisha's base image)**
**::lk (changes bot's avatar to Lord Knight's image)**
**::vp (changes bot's avatar to Void Princess's image)**
**::ws (changes bot's avatar to Wind Sneeker's image)**
